channel.title: ReCreate YourSelf more powerfull more supream and more like Pwnd
channel.description:
Second Life the game is a replica of the real world and you can comunicate with the rest of the world on it :)
link: [url=http://www.secondlife.com/?u=014a9848b1924c19a2fcebd5d26ef5c6]Second life[/url]
screen shots: non atm i couldnt find any so im going to take some
Basics: well from what i have just read you can get a job, get new houses , pets objects ,clothes ect... you can well do everything you can do in real life...
users active: well last time i checked there was 35,435 players online
Tip: when you get the box of who refered you please put in [b]Pwnarz Hax[/b] thanks ;)

I hate Second Life. It lags horribly on our computer. I don’t see how my sister could stand it. It also looked really really boring. But hey, if it floats your boat, go for it…
